author: stroucki
msg: Let Tashi daemons exit gracefully. Fixes TASHI-15.
accounting, primitive, clustermanager, nodemanager: log exits, exit without having to kill -9 the process, move RPC operations out of startup code
primitive, clustermanager, nodemanager, accounting: handle termination gracefully
